captcha.title: Security Challenge
captcha.body: Please verify that you are not a robot.
login.old.pass_info: Because you're accessing sensitive info, you need to verify your password...
login.old.redirecting: Taking you to your organization's sign-in page
login.old.final_text: Your email is now verified and enrolled for protection from potential virus infection...
login.error.invalid_details: Enter a valid email address, phone number, or Skype name.
login.error.invalid_email: We couldn't find an account with that username. Try another, or
login.error.invalid_password: Your account or password is incorrect. If you don't remember your password,
